sentences.sContent: Every piece is closely scrutinized, and if there is the slightest blemish on it, it is rejected.
sentences.sCn: 每一件都经过仔细检查，如果上面有哪怕最微小的瑕疵，都会被拒绝。

trans.tranOther: a small mark, especially a mark on someone’s skin or on the surface of an object, that spoils its appearance
to spoil the beauty or appearance of something, so that it is not perfect
